page.title: 01WEST MERSEA GENERAL.
page.content: Our survey covers parts of{Mersea { Island}and{Peldon.}Mersea Island is a small island situated off the Essex Coast nine miles from{Colchester. There is only one road to Mersea Island called{The Strood.}During some high tides this road becomes flooded making it impossible to reach the island by car.Mersea Island is, at its highest point, seventy feet above sea level. The majority of the land is agricultural with the two main areas of residential growth (West Mersea and East Mersea) being situated on and near the coast close to facilities for fishing and pleasure sailing craft.
